cyclone.name: GRACE
cyclone.current_location: about 155 miles SE of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest across Hispaniola, then toward eastern and west-central Cuba and eventually the Gulf of Mexico
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern coast of the Dominican Republic / Haiti (Hispaniola)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch for the entire coasts of the Dominican Republic and Haiti
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Leeward Islands, Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola, eastern-to-west-central Cuba, southeastern Bahamas, and later the Gulf Coast
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None listed (St. Croix not in table)
weather_observation.wind: Occasional tropical-storm-force gusts possible as squalls pass while center moves away west of the island.
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–6 inches possible; scattered flash and urban flooding likely.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along south- and east-facing beaches.
